title: F*cked up Screen
body: After downloading the patch this morning , the loading screen and game screen were reduced to the upper right corner of my computer. I now have to play in window mode because both borderless and full screen are not centered on my computer and have parts cut off. Incredibly frustrating.

replies.body:
This is a an issue we're investigating per the current [sticky](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/nxyEq9WA-532017-14-screen-directx-error-issues).  Until we get a more permanent fix, we do have a workaround by switching to windowed mode.  How to do this will vary depending on what pc you're using:

> **For Mac players**:  [Example screenshot here](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/302242899322601473/309346698331947018/Screen_Shot_2017-05-03_at_11.12.37_PM.png)
> 
> Tapping Alt+Enter in-game can serve as a work around.   This will toggle you out of fullscreen and into windowed mode to restore your game screen.

-----
> **For PC players**:  This may come up as a DirectX error
> 
> Delete your **Config folder**.  This  is typically found at C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
> 
>As a heads up this will reset your resolution, settings, and keybindings to default.
> 

I hope that helps!
